about_the_game:
Story Plot: After graduating from university, you start to work as a photographer in a small agency. But after a business trip, your boss requests you to let a Japanese model live with you for a short time. But your apartment is only big enough for a small bed. Furthermore, he wants you to turn her into a slut for his own scheme. What will you do then?

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:
  • Gentleman Route: You keep being nice and try to help the women. At the end of the story, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them.
  • Jerk Route: Even though you act like a jerk, you still try to help the women in secret. At the end of the story, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them.
  • Sharing Route: You act like a jerk and share the women with other guys.
  • NTR Route: You have to watch other guys fooling around with the women.

The Photographer is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.
  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.
  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Thank you for playing The Photographer.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

content_descriptors.notes:
The Photographer is an erotic Visual Novel and is intended for adults only. The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. All characters are depicted as 18 and over. It contains adult language, alcohol usage, nudity, sexual themes, sexual situations, sexual penetrations.
More clarification: sexual assault/non-consensual sex in the game only happens as 'groping'. Rapes and other sexual violence aren't available in the game.
And these 'groping scenes' only happen if the gamers want them. Everything depends on the gamers' choices. Nothing can happen if the gamers don't want to.

detailed_description:
Story Plot: After graduating from university, you start to work as a photographer in a small agency. But after a business trip, your boss requests you to let a Japanese model live with you for a short time. But your apartment is only big enough for a small bed. Furthermore, he wants you to turn her into a slut for his own scheme. What will you do then?

Depending on your choices, the game will lead you to one of these routes:
  • Gentleman Route: You keep being nice and try to help the women. At the end of the story, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them.
  • Jerk Route: Even though you act like a jerk, you still try to help the women in secret. At the end of the story, you’ll be able to choose one of the women or all of them.
  • Sharing Route: You act like a jerk and share the women with other guys.
  • NTR Route: You have to watch other guys fooling around with the women.

The Photographer is an Erotic Visual Novel (Eroge) with multiple routes and multiple endings:
  • If you hate NTR (Netorare), you only need to stop the other guys from touching your women.
  • If you're okay with sharing, you can let the other guys have fun with your women.
  • But if you let everything get out of your control, you'll lose everything!

Thank you for playing The Photographer.

I'm very appreciative of your feedback after playing so I can make it better in my future projects.

Regards!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: The Photographer (Nymphs) - Demo

  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In The Photographer, you can have a happy ending (Romance Ending or Harem Ending), a neutral ending (Sharing Ending) or a sad ending (NTR Ending) depending on how you play.
